mapper.sql: SELECT bn_treatmentreimburse.ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.Pay_Type, bn_treatmentreimburse.Apply_Hospital_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.Reim_NO, bn_treatmentreimburse.Sfzh, bn_treatmentreimburse.Medicare_State, bn_treatmentreimburse.Person_Code, bn_treatmentreimburse.Reim_Source, bn_treatmentreimburse.BillNO, bn_treatmentreimburse.TreatmentHosptial_Code, bn_treatmentreimburse.TreatmentHosptial, bn_treatmentreimburse.Treatment_NO, bn_treatmentreimburse.Reim_Type_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.In_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.Out_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.Medicare_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.TypeIn_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.Medicare_Line, bn_treatmentreimburse.StdDisease_Code, bn_treatmentreimburse.StdDisease_Name, bn_treatmentreimburse.AMoney, bn_treatmentreimburse.BMoney, bn_treatmentreimburse.CMoney, bn_treatmentreimburse.ZL_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.ZF_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.YLZ_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.GR_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.YBBX_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.XNH_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.Family_Code, bn_treatmentreimburse.Apply_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.DBBX_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.Card_NO, bn_treatmentreimburse.Finish_Flag, bn_treatmentreimburse.SfLb, bn_treatmentreimburse.JGBM, bn_treatmentreimburse.PrintCount, bn_treatmentreimburse.Operator_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.Create_Time, bn_treatmentreimburse.Pay_Operator_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.Finish_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.SelfBaseMoney, bn_treatmentreimburse.YLJZ_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.Cancel_Date, bn_treatmentreimburse.Cancel_Operator_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.Memo, bn_treatmentreimburse.YB_Info, bn_treatmentreimburse.YBHG_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.SelfBaseMoney_Total, bn_treatmentreimburse.YLJZ_Money_Total, bn_treatmentreimburse.Spec_BN, bn_treatmentreimburse.CYDBBC_Money, bn_treatmentreimburse.IdentityType_ID, bn_treatmentreimburse.SelBaseMoney_ZY_Total, bn_treatmentreimburse.GR_Accout_Pay, bn_treatmentreimburse.YB_Other_Pay, dict_familymember1.Name, dict_familymember1.Ry_Zt, dict_identitytype.Name AS IdentityType_Name, dict_hospital.Name AS Apply_Hospital_Name, OperUser.CNName AS Operator_Name, PayUser.UserName AS Pay_Operator_Name, CancelUser.UserName AS Cancel_Operator_Name FROM dict_familymember1 INNER JOIN bn_treatmentreimburse ON dict_familymember1.Sfzh = bn_treatmentreimburse.Sfzh INNER JOIN dict_identitytype ON bn_treatmentreimburse.IdentityType_ID = dict_identitytype.ID INNER JOIN dict_hospital ON bn_treatmentreimburse.Apply_Hospital_ID = dict_hospital.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN aspnet_users OperUser ON bn_treatmentreimburse.Operator_ID = OperUser.UserId LEFT OUTER JOIN aspnet_users PayUser ON bn_treatmentreimburse.Pay_Operator_ID = PayUser.UserId LEFT OUTER JOIN aspnet_users CancelUser ON bn_treatmentreimburse.Cancel_Operator_ID = CancelUser.UserId WHERE 1=1
